alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 12:54AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ST. BERNARD, SOUTH CENTRAL ORLEANS AND NORTHWESTERN PLAQUEMINES PARISHES THROUGH 130 AM CST... At 1254 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Meraux to near Belle Chasse to 6 miles southeast of Woodmere. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Belle Chasse, Chalmette, Jean Lafitte, Violet, Meraux, Shell Beach, and Poydras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
